Description: Hi,  I am selling this Gibson Les Paul Traditional 2016 Heritage Cherry Sunburst, RRP£2295!! Fantastic guitar sold with its original Gibson Hard case in brown Tolex with Pink fluffy interior (90's style), comes with Gibson certificate, paperwork and truss rod tool....It's a no-nonsense Les Paul made to be as close to the originals, the body is non-weight relieved mahogany, weighing a total of 9.7lbs or 4.4kg, this one features a very active flamed AA figured maple top showing details of wood grain and mineral deposit, striking cherry sunburst, great sounding PAF like humbuckers for that unmistakable Gibson Les Paul tone, it has a very comfortable rosewood neck. The Guitar is in very good condition, there is a bit of "players wear" as it has been used and will show a couple of indentation dings, scratches and buckle marks but nothing major (please see pictures) it is in otherwise really good condition with all original parts, it also features Gibson "proper" wiring (see pics)!! Guitar has just been polished, Fretboard was just treated with lemon oil and restrung with a fresh set of strings! this guitar was also fitted with Gibson historic parts: Blank truss rod cover, 60's style knob and nickel thumb bleeders, original traditional truss rod cover and knobs are present and sold with the guitar in case you wanted to put that back on... I am always happy to help so do not hesitate to get in touch and ask any questions or request more pictures. Please check my other items for sale! Shipping to UK:£25 Eu: £110 Rest of the World: £180
Title: Gibson Les Paul Heritage Cherry Sunburst AA flame top RRP£2295
ConditionDescription: Gibson Les Paul Traditional in very good condition, some signs of wear, beautiful AA flamed top.
